snippet.title: ASTRAL GUARD - Mother Direct 2022 Trailer
snippet.description:
https://twitter.com/AstralGuardGame
astralguard.net
---------------------------------
✨Welcome to the Crew! ✨

Astral Guard is an interplanetary RPG adventure following a group of aliens to stop a vicious hivemind from taking over the solar system. Find friends, fight foes, and travel the stars! 💫

The game follows Axis, a Lin from the planet Felo who's always dreamed of leaving his home and exploring the stars. He always figured it was just a dream that he'd let go of eventually...until one fateful night when he's visited by the last member of the Astral Guard in desperate need of help...
---------------------------------

What a BLAST!!! I had a FANTASTIC time working on this; I had to balance school, filming, gamedev, animation...lots and lots of stuff. BUT!! It all came out superb! I'm so proud of everyone who worked on this, I couldn't have done it without you. I had this idea over a year ago now, and it's crazy cool seeing it come to fruition like this. I hope you all enjoy!!! 
------CREDITS--------------
DIRECTOR
Mason Saulsbury (Punkitt)

WRITING
Mason Saulsbury
JJ Kochly

ARTISTS
Mottley (@Mottley_)
Aggro Tadpole (@aggrotadpole)
Mason Saulsbury

MUSIC
Eric Pierce

ANIMATION
Mason Saulsbury

COLORING
Mason Saulsbury
Mottley
DemonClaus (@demonclaus)
Russel Masterson (❤️)

EDITING
Mason Saulsbury

VOICE ACTING
Libby Williams

THUMBNAIL ART
Mottley
---------------------------
